scripts.build:all: concurrently "cd empresas && npm run build" "cd home && npm run build" "cd login && npm run build" "cd main && npm run build" "cd parceiros && npm run build" "cd sobre && npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd empresas && npm start" "cd home && npm start" "cd login && npm start" "cd main && npm start" "cd parceiros && npm start" "cd sobre && npm start"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd empresas && npm i" "cd home && npm i" "cd login && npm i" "cd main && npm i" "cd parceiros && npm i" "cd sobre && npm i" "npm i"
scripts.install-cli: concurrently "cd empresas && npm install -D webpack-cli" "cd home && npm install -D webpack-cli" "cd login && npm install -D webpack-cli" "cd main && npm install -D webpack-cli" "cd parceiros && npm install -D webpack-cli" "cd sobre && npm install -D webpack-cli"
